page.title: 08NEW HOUSING-WALES & AREA.
page.content: The housing estate in{Killamarsh}is being built by a small local firm.All the houses will have four bedrooms. They are built out of stone.They are valued from Â£32,000 and there are fifteen detached houses being built altogether.The people who are buying the houses can choose their own layout for the rooms from four different design plans. There are twenty-eight new houses being built in{Wales}consisting of 10 detached houses,12 bungalows & 6 semi detached.They will cost from Â£22,500 to 40,595.They will be finished around Jan-Feb 1986.They are made of brick, and pre-cast concrete tiles.The number of bedrooms varies from 2 to 4.They are built by "North Homes", a large local firm. Gas and electric fuel will be supplied to all the homes.
